comments.author: hannesw@gmail.com
comments.body: Committed to git master. Thanks a lot for the patch, Daniel!

description:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux x86_64; en-US) AppleWebKit/533.4 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/5.0.375.125 Safari/533.4
Build Identifier: cvs+586057

jsr/ret (subroutine instructions) are deprecated in Java 6 bytecode. They have been shown to be difficult to verify and questionable in benefit. The solution a la JDK is to inline finally blocks where necessary.

Reproducible: Always
summary: eliminate use of jsr instruction for Java 6 bytecode
